pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Creates a source block of water at the target location.$(br)$(l)Magical School:$() $(2)Wit$()$(br)$(l)Mana Cost:$() 8$(br)$(l)Cooldown:$() 1.5 seconds$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/opaline_scepter)Opaline Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/iridescent_scepter)Iridescent Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/lustrous_scepter)Lustrous Scepter$()$(br)$(l)Tier:$() 1
